channel.description: Recent content in 100days on Neil Spink

item.title: 100days.ink — A Commitment Engine
item.description: I’ve been building 100days.ink, a small app with a big purpose: help people commit to something for 100 days and actually follow through. The rules are simple: Write down your 100-day commitment. Pick a start or end date. Decide if it’s private, public, or shared with the community. Put some skin in the game — tip from $2 to $147. That’s it. No feeds. No distractions. Just you versus the next 100 days.
